A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi is an emotionally complex\, beautifully crafted addition to the Star Wars saga. The performances are uniformly excellent\, with Mark Hamil and Carrie Fisher putting in their best performances in the series. The script is incredibly written and provides so many unexpected twists and turns that made my jaw drop (it’s quite funny too). The action is furious and exhilarating and the world of Star Wars has never looked better. All in all\, it is truly terrific!
